rows.label: qst701605_msg0001
rows.name:
It's a bold thing to hold a cooking
contest in these turbulent times.

rows.label: qst701605_msg0002
rows.name: But I'm very grateful to you.

rows.label: qst701605_msg0003
rows.name:
You've inspired Ms. Sorrel to put her
heart into her food, and that's good
enough for me.

rows.label: qst701605_msg0101
rows.name: So it's finally time for the big cook-off.

rows.label: qst701605_msg0102
rows.name:
I do hope that Ms. Sorrel has found
the "spice" she needed to start cooking
properly again.

rows.label: qst701605_msg0103
rows.name:
And of course, I'm looking forward to
sampling all the other meals as well!

rows.label: qst701605_msg0104
rows.name:
I swear I'll take that secret recipe
back to Superbia yet!
